metadata.title: CVE-2019-16686 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Dolibarr 9.0.5 has stored XSS in a User Note section to note.php. A userwith no privileges can inject script to attack the admin.

criterions.comment: dolibarr: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
